html:
12.20.23  4:14 am   What are some ways that you find inspiration and how do you stay motivated?

      the reason i'm unable to comprehend the phrase "stay motivated" here, is because it's missing the phrase after it. "motivated to _______?". i've never know how to really figure out what someone's talking about when they talk about motivation without specifying what for. would be like asking google maps to show you how to get to

12.20.23  3:25 am   Do you play chess?

      not very often, but i could do it if necessary

12.20.23  3:15 am   Why does everyone need to categorize everything?

     it's fun and useful

     Can't we all just be? I be.

12.20.23  2:09 am   do you think writing a song past 4 minutes would relinquish too much control of the song to yourself, the decisions you made when you were writing the beginning parts, in the past?

      no

12.20.23  1:28 am   I just really feel like a pencil today

      that's ok

12.20.23  12:15 am   please dip me in nacho cheese sauce

      i'll do it when i get a chance

12.20.23  12:05 am   How do you decide if you're good enough?

      it's not really anyone's decision, it's already a yes. but you can probably make yourself even better, when the right mood comes around

12.19.23  11:53 pm   Do you have the feeling where you make music and no longer feel like you are present, only music?

     it's hard to match that description to the experience. musical experiences are often indescribable in any way other than with music

      If so, can you voluntarily enter this state?

     just about

12.19.23  11:37 pm   How do I come to terms with the fact that I can't change that I am me

      lean into it. be even more you

12.19.23  11:24 pm   can you give me dating advice

      not really

12.19.23  11:06 pm   Without using the word "good" or synonyms of "good". what does "good" mean to you?

      beneficial to something. beneficial to what? if the beneficiary is not named, then it's unclear what we're talking about

12.19.23  10:42 pm   do you like Billy Joel's music?

      could happen

12.19.23  10:27 pm   would understanding that you won't understand everything be a form of understanding everything?

      barely

12.19.23  9:45 pm   what is the porpoise

      it's multi-porpoise

12.19.23  9:31 pm   Do you ever just feel tired?

      yes

12.19.23  9:26 pm   Is oxygen necessary for animals to live?

      some animals, at least

12.19.23  9:04 pm   Ever get a really good idea for a song but by the time you sit down to write it it's devolved into an 8-bar musical nugget that goes nowhere and just loops on itself?

     maybe

      That keeps happening to me. How do you push through?

     try a variety of different methods, other time. keep that one in the list as is, then think of some new ones, then try to modify the 8 bar one

12.19.23  8:31 pm   should I go to film school?

      i have no idea. i don't know what happens there

12.19.23  8:26 pm   what are the chords for the kind of Organ instrument in the "i go to the castle, let all my traoublea float away" section in Ball and Stick. 

      i haven't heard it in a long time, but i'd be shocked if any of that was chordally anything more than 4maj7 1maj7 repeated. in the key of B, i believe

12.19.23  8:00 pm   what are you when you grow up

      a person

12.19.23  6:40 pm   What are your thoughts on concepts

      none. i skip the middle man and think directly about the thing that the concept is a concept of

12.19.23  4:34 pm   i really like making stuff. i really like being productive. but i often ask myself, "how to know if i really, truly like doing something?" i have to force myself a little bit, obviously, to get started, to actually do stuff - otherwise i'd just rot in bed all day, and i know i don't want that. "how much *forcing* myself is too much?" "when can i say 'ok, this isn't for me'?" i am not asking you to give me the answers to these questions. only i will have the answers, someday. what i want to ask you is, have YOU ever asked YOURSELF these questions? if so, how did you answer them (for yourself)?

      i think i just take my current opinion and then add it to the collection of previous opinions on the same subject, and over time take the average, which converges to an increasingly well balanced answer

12.19.23  4:33 pm   have you had thoughts about destroying the world for a few minutes

      no

12.19.23  4:32 pm   Am I allowed to ask a question?

      sure

12.19.23  3:50 pm   would you buy a 40 dollar fortnite car

      no

12.19.23  2:23 pm   Do you feel pillow should be spelled pilleuagh?

      no, and i'd take it a step further and argue that there are some words that are spelled more in that second style that i think would be better off in that first style. There are still other cases where words have already made such a transition, and still more cases where words are currently midway through the transition, still being accepted both ways

12.19.23  1:47 pm   do you think that poorly-written literature or other text-based media detracts from the message they convey

     sure, that could easily happen

     or do you think that the message is crucial regardless and making the consumer work hard to understand it through annoying tropes (most notably in poetry) is part of the challenge?

     if you hate the writing, you don't like it. and you won't get it. if you're a writer, and someone hates your writing, then they won't like it, and they won't get it. not sure where that leaves us

12.19.23  1:00 pm   i feel like i dont have anyone to talk to about my problems right now

      ok well then you can talk to me about them

12.19.23  12:57 pm   do you ever find yourself being limited by the 12 tone equal temperament system?

     sure

     do you like exploring outside of it to approach a certain feeling of sound?

     that would be essentially any song i sing on (which is.... all of them), because i never tune my vocals

12.19.23  12:42 pm   i wanna change the world for the better without anyone knowing. do you think its a solid idea or are there holes in it?

      it's solid

12.19.23  11:51 am   Why is everything so complicated?

     that's your fault

     Can't the universe just act nice for once and be simple?

     sure but you would get bored

12.19.23  11:45 am   do you think they should add more music notes than the standard seven?

      i thought there were more like 12, or more like about 90 if you include multiple octaves, ..... or more like infinite if you include the full range of frequency between the steps

12.19.23  11:17 am   Do you think intelligence and sadness are correlated?

      not really

12.19.23  9:47 am   You've mentioned that part of why you need this website is the ability to backdate. Could you elaborate on that?

      i can post an old thing and put it at the correct place in the timeline, with the correct date, according to when it was made, not when it was posted online

12.19.23  7:43 am   Is there a specified amount of time between the present becoming the past and/or the future?

      yes, it's the same as the number of pixels between the one pixel and the next

12.19.23  7:23 am   If you went on a gameshow would you win the biggun 

      if i could predict the outcome of games correctly then i'd be playing a different game

12.19.23  6:51 am   hey, bill. i've been really struggling to write lately. can you give me a really motivational and moving sentence to think of whenever i'm struggling to write to remind me to keep going? 

      you don't have to write if you don't want to. but if you suddenly crave being allowed to say anything you want, then go ahead

12.19.23  6:04 am   How much time do you spend NOT making art? 

      i don't recall

12.19.23  5:53 am   Is pizza really a vegetable?

      parts of it may be

12.19.23  5:51 am   The tighter we hold the reins, the slower the horse will go.
It's ok to step back and let things breathe. The frustration will give way to clarity and you'll find what you want.

      that sounds like it came from the hallmark section, but that doesn't mean it's not true

12.19.23  5:31 am   how do I get better at making videos

      make more videos

12.19.23  4:26 am   what is the bpm in got to know what's going on?

      it's probably not too hard for either of us to check, but i'll estimate from memory that it might be around 92 or so

12.19.23  3:58 am   Are you a philosopher?

      only if necessary to compete with another philosopher

12.19.23  3:58 am   Do you think "have a nice day" always means the one person thinks that they and the other don't care about each other?

      that seems to be its most common use, in the dialects i'm familiar with

12.19.23  3:25 am   i have about 8 half finished/composed songs on my computer right now, how do i actually get myself to finish them instead of having a new idea and spending time working on a new one "ill definitely finish"

      you still have no idea what order you're going do them. because you can't do all 8 at the exact same time, there's currently too much unknown about the actual procedure, so you can't even comprehend how you're going to go about it. start by figuring out what order they should be done in. figure this out far away from the studio, so you're not overwhelmed

12.19.23  2:43 am   are you autistic? because i am 

     it's hard to do the test because many of the multiple-choice questions seem to have absolutely no good answer among the choices

12.19.23  2:14 am   what is your opinion on walls?

      they are adorable

12.19.23  1:24 am   are there limits to the definition of a sandwich?

      almost

12.19.23  1:15 am   You've been doing more interviews lately, which I love. Can you do some with musicians so I can hear you talk about your music? It's the most genius part of your genius and I can't eat you to absorb your power so i want to learn from you

      there should be 3 coming up with a very musical focus. however, i still have to consult with them because i need to ask them if they're gonna do the thing where they throw a clip at the beginning before the intro that's only gonna get repeated later. if they're gonna do that then i'm not going on the show, i always forget to ask that but i've made a new years resolution to start remembering

12.19.23  1:12 am   do you have thoughts on Zappa or at all

      not really. his work does not connect with me nor appeal to me in any way. however, that does not mean it's not good
